EmailTemplate.name: 18-Smart Cities-City as a platform-Email-Nurture SmartCity-T003GY.Email 4 Smart
EmailTemplate.subject: Create a smart, safe and sustainable future for your city
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Brochure Build a smarter, safer and more sustainable city Smart cities want to use digital technologies to empower citizens, improve safety, operate sustainably and attract the best employers. To succeed, they need a platform that can interconnect systems, processes, activities and people. Read our brochure <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/onestore?asset=205706&did=d0000000018b&utm_campaign=city_as_a_platform&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email4:smartcity-brochure&utm_term=smartcity]]> to learn how the Nokia Bell Labs Future X for Smart city architecture can help you safely build a future proof journey to make your city an attractive home for innovation and economic growth. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]>
